section.name: Credits
section.p: As with many open source projects, DbUnit has to thank not only the developer and the user community but some supporting companies too, as they provide us licenses, bandwith, space and all sorts of things that usually you have to pay for.
Here follows the list of companies supporting the project.

ul.li: SourceForge provides us the web space, the Subversion repository and all other tools in its great platform;
Cenqua is providing us its Clover code coverage tool with Maven plugin;
Gentleware provides us its UML diagramming tool;
ejTechnologies have issued free license of its profiling tool;

section.p: To all of them our sincere thanks for their kindly support!
